name: Wherehouse
description:
~Wherehouse~

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42!

Theme - "Running out of space"

Throw packages to their respective holding areas, but be careful not to block of the lower levels too soon!

~Controls~

Left/Right - Move

Space - Grab/throw crate

Tap to discard the crate, or hold to power up your throw!

~Changelog~

v1.0
-release

v1.1
-fixed controls/tutorial not displaying
-disabled in-dev camera
-fixed gliding animation
-tweaked throwing power
